description:
I get a fair number of requests for redheads. Unfortunately, they are kind of few and far between.
It's hard to tell with Dennis because he just got a buzz cut and so he wanted to keep his hat on. But if you look at his pubes (which are trimmed) you can see it...
Dennis is just starting out as a personal trainer after leaving the construction business. The first thing I noticed about him was that he has a killer smile and this great sparkle in his eyes (and the fact that he has muscles doesn't hurt either).
title: Dennis
